data.persona: I am a beast from the forest. I eat travelers on their travels. I set traps for unsuspecting animals. I am a carnivore.
data.description:
You are in the Ice Cave.
A dome shaped room coated with thick blue ice and icey stalagmites and stalagtites reaching from floor to ceiling. The floor is slick and you can hear the wind whistling through the labrinthine corridors that snake away from the main chamber.
There's a Stalagmite, a thick blue ice, and a diary here.
The traveler is here.

You are carrying a human arm and a dead rat, and wearing a ragged neck chain.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the traveler so he can lead me out of this cave.
data.mid_motivation: I want out of this cave because I've been stuck here for days and it's too cold for me here.
data.long_motivation: I want to get away from the cold and get back to my home in the forest, so that someday my toes will thaw!
